name: Scratch cat-A platformer
description:
WASD or arrow keys to move this is V1.1

I did not share my project until version V1.1 came out is because I really wanted an FPS counter to come!

sorry about the ending but the last platform is for fun you can't get there 

-------------------------------------STORY---------------------------------

Scratch cat has been waiting for someone to code in lasanghia so it can eat it but there is one problem there are so many platforms for the cat to go through help scratch cat jump over the platforms to find HIS LASANGHIA!
